description: When PGP encrypts files PKR (public keyring) and SKR (private keyring) files are created to store the keys, or passphrase, used to decrypt the encrypted files. In Windows, these keyring files are stored in the "PGP" folder of your "My Documents" folder.
NOTE: PGP Desktop Home is no longer developed.

common_filenames.description: secring.skr - The default name given to SKR files (PKR files are named pubring.pkr by default).
secring.skr - The default name given to SKR files (PKR files are named pubring.pkr by default).
